about_the_game:
Note: The base game is required to use the items in this set. Please make sure you have updated to the latest version.

Gain 2,500 rift crystals, which can be used to hire pawns or purchase special items.

Note: Rift crystals are also obtainable in-game.
After purchase, the crystals will be granted after staying at an inn.
